hero.title: Shareholder management for cooperatives
hero.subtitle: The open-source platform that helps cooperatives manage shareholders, shares, dividends, and documents — all in one place.

features.title: Everything your cooperative needs
features.subtitle: From shareholder registration to dividend distribution, OpenCoop handles the complete lifecycle.

shareholders.title: Shareholder Management
shareholders.description: Register individuals, companies, and minors. Track statuses, contact details, and beneficial owners.

shares.title: Share Classes & Transactions
shares.description: Configure multiple share classes with pricing, limits, and voting rights. Process purchases, sales, and transfers.

dividends.title: Dividend Distribution
dividends.description: Calculate dividends with automatic withholding tax. Generate statements per shareholder.

banking.title: Bank Import & OGM Matching
banking.description: Import bank statements and automatically match payments using structured communication codes.

documents.title: Document Generation
documents.description: Generate share certificates, purchase statements, and dividend statements as branded PDF documents.

multiTenant.title: Multi-tenant & White Label
multiTenant.description: Host multiple cooperatives on a single instance. Each coop gets custom branding, their own URL, and settings.

howItWorks.title: Up and running in minutes
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to digitize your cooperative.

step1.title: Create your cooperative
step1.description: Set up your coop with share classes, bank details, and branding.

step2.title: Invite shareholders
step2.description: Shareholders register online and purchase shares via bank transfer.

step3.title: Manage & grow
step3.description: Track transactions, match payments, distribute dividends, and generate documents.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.q1: What if I need more share classes or dividend runs?
faq.a1: Upgrade to Professional at any time. Your data and settings are preserved — no migration needed.
faq.q2: Can I switch between monthly and yearly billing?
faq.a2: Yes, you can switch at any time. When moving to yearly billing, you'll receive a prorated credit for your current billing period.
faq.a3: Priority support includes faster response times via email and help with configuration, data imports, and general platform questions.
faq.q4: Can I migrate from self-hosted to the SaaS platform?
faq.a4: Yes. Contact us and we'll help you migrate your data from your self-hosted instance to the managed platform.
